architectureStyle.description: Utopian, optimistic futurism - welcoming, open, and harmonious with nature
keyElements: Curved glass domes and organic flowing lines
White/beige walls with large transparent aluminum windows
Lush interior gardens visible through windows
Clean energy integration (solar panels, fusion reactors)
Starfleet delta emblems on official buildings
San Francisco / Vulcan temple influenced design
NO military brutalism - even defense structures are elegant
architectureStyle.colors: Pearl white, light gray, blue accents, transparent glass, chrome trim
